channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WBW Currency Switcher for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WBW Currency Switcher for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2022-2575|2024-08-03T00:39:08.118Z -- unknown -- wbw%20currency%20switcher%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The WBW Currency Switcher for WooCommerce WordPress plugin before 1.6.6 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
